abstract_summ: The gold-standard COVID-19 diagnosis relies on detecting SARS-CoV-2 using RNA purification and one-step retrotranscription and quantitative PCR (RT-qPCR) We tested three methods based on direct nasopharyngeal swab viral transmission medium (VTM) heating before the RT-PCR . The sensitivity of this method was satisfactory . The number of cycles required was shortened by about 2 .
